detail_desc: Long, straight-cut kaftan in an airy weave with billowing flounces at the front that go over the shoulders and continue down the back. V-shaped opening at the top and a drawstring with narrow ties at the neckline.

Long, straight-cut kaftan in an airy weave with billowing flounces at the front that go over the shoulders and continue down the back. V-shaped opening at the top and a drawstring with narrow ties at the neckline.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Ankle-length dress in airy, mosaic-patterned organic silk. Deep V-neck with narrow, padded stitching around the neckline and parts of the waist. Long, wide, voluminous sleeves that taper at the cuffs. Straight cut in a softly draping, relaxed fit with a slit at the front. Lined in woven fabric made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a round neckline and print motif on the front.

Sleeveless playsuit in a viscose and linen weave with a V-neck front and back and tie-top shoulder straps. Wrapover front with a concealed press-stud, a seam at the waist with covered elastication and a drawstring, and pockets in the side seams.

Sleeveless playsuit in a viscose and linen weave with a V-neck front and back and tie-top shoulder straps. Wrapover front with a concealed press-stud, a seam at the waist with covered elastication and a drawstring, and pockets in the side seams.
Jumpsuit woven in a viscose blend with a flounce-trimmed V-neck front and back. Seam with covered elastication at the waist, side pockets and wide, straight legs.

Small, lightly padded backpack in nylon with shimmering, holographic reversible sequins on the front and sides. Zip and handle at the top, adjustable shoulder straps with metal buckles, and a zipped outer compartment. Lined. Size 8x15x18 cm.

Calf-length dress in airy, crinkled chiffon with gathers around the neckline and short puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the hems. Seam and drawstring at the waist with narrow ties at the front. Softly draping, lightweight skirt in double-flounced tiers for added volume and movement. Concealed zip at the back. Chiffon lining.

Straight-cut shirt jacket in woven fabric with a soft, brushed finish. Collar, a zip down the front and yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets and long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs. Unlined.

Straight-cut shirt jacket in woven fabric with a soft, brushed finish. Collar, a zip down the front and yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets and long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs. Unlined.

Straight-cut blouse in a sturdy, jacquard-weave viscose blend with a pattern in shimmering metallic thread. Round neckline, dropped shoulders and short, voluminous, double-layered puff sleeves. Small opening with a covered button at the back of the neck and a seam at the hem with a wide, flared peplum.

Wrapover blouse in an airy, lightly crinkled weave made from a cotton blend. V-neck, kaftan sleeves with wide flounced trims, a tie belt that can be wrapped around the waist several times, and a straight hem.

Small backpack in imitation leather with ear-shaped appliqués and embroidery on the front. Zip with a soft faux fur pompom and a handle at the top. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps in fabric. Lined. Depth 6.5 cm. Width 16.5 cm. Height approx. 20 cm.
Trousers in soft, organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Trousers in soft, organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Trousers in soft, organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Long-sleeved tops in organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a round neckline and press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y). Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved tops in organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a round neckline and press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y). Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved tops in organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a round neckline and press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y). Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Cycling shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned details. High waist with wide, elasticated ribbing. The shorts are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Blouse in airy organza with a collar, covered buttons down the front, 3/4-length puff sleeves and narrow cuffs with a covered button. Unlined.
Blouse in airy organza with a collar, covered buttons down the front, 3/4-length puff sleeves and narrow cuffs with a covered button. Unlined.
Fingerless gloves in a soft, fine knit with ribbed cuffs.
Fingerless gloves in a soft, fine knit with ribbed cuffs.
Classic T-shirts in soft, printed cotton jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a ribbed trim around the neckline.

T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a ribbed trim around the neckline.

Jacket in washed, stretch denim with a detachable hood and sleeves in lightweight sweatshirt fabric. Collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button, pockets in the side seams and ribbed cuffs.
Lightly padded jacket in cotton denim with a faux shearling-covered collar, buttons down the front, fake top pockets and buttoned cuffs. Lined in soft cotton flannel.

5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs. Shaping – denim with a stretch function that holds in and shapes the waist, thighs and bum while keeping the jeans in shape.

Long-sleeved Henley top in soft, ribbed cotton jersey with a button placket and small fabric appliqué at the hem.

5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs. Made using Lycra® Beauty technology to retain the shape of the jeans and provide a sculpting effect with optimal comfort.

Top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif, jersey-lined hood with a wrapover front, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs and wide ribbing at the hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif, jersey-lined hood with a wrapover front, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs and wide ribbing at the hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif, jersey-lined hood with a wrapover front, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs and wide ribbing at the hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif, jersey-lined hood with a wrapover front, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs and wide ribbing at the hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved tops in soft sweatshirt fabric with print motifs. One top with a jersey-lined hood, both with ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Set with a long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric and pair of leggings in jersey. Top with a print motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. Leggings with an elasticated waist and all-over print.

Padded, slightly longer jacket with a lined, detachable hood, stand up collar and a wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front. Long sleeves with inner ribbing, a drawstring at the waist and patch front pockets with a flap. Lining and padding in recycled polyester.

Knee-length, padded jacket in a quilted weave with a padded, stand-up collar and a detachable hood with press-studs at the front. Zip with a chin guard and a wind flap with press-studs down the front. Narrow elastication at the cuffs, diagonal welt front pockets and vents with press-studs at the sides. Lined.

Knee-length, padded jacket in a quilted weave with a padded, stand-up collar and a detachable hood with press-studs at the front. Zip with a chin guard and a wind flap with press-studs down the front. Narrow elastication at the cuffs, diagonal welt front pockets and vents with press-studs at the sides. Lined.

Relaxed-fit jacket in washed cotton denim with worn details. Collar, buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Flap chest pockets with a button, concealed side pockets, and an adjustable tab at the sides of the hem. The cotton content of the jacket is partly organic.

Relaxed-fit jacket in washed cotton denim with worn details. Collar, buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Flap chest pockets with a button, concealed side pockets, and an adjustable tab at the sides of the hem. The cotton content of the jacket is partly organic.
Teddy coat in faux fur with a collar, concealed press-studs down the front and patch front pockets. Lined.
Teddy coat in faux fur with a collar, concealed press-studs down the front and patch front pockets. Lined.
Teddy coat in faux fur with a collar, concealed press-studs down the front and patch front pockets. Lined.

Wide dress in airy, crinkled fabric with a flounce around the neckline and down the front. V-shaped opening with narrow ties at the neckline, dropped shoulders and long, slightly wider sleeves with a drawstring and frill trim at the cuffs. Gathered seams at the waist and hem for added width. Sewn-in, V-neck underdress in jersey with adjustable shoulder straps. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled. The polyester content of the underdress is recycled.
Leggings in sturdy cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a low, V-shaped waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Ankle-length jeggings in stretch denim with worn details. Extra-high waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and slim legs with raw-edge hems.
Ankle-length jeggings in stretch denim with worn details. Extra-high waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and slim legs with raw-edge hems.

Short, straight-cut dress in soft cotton jersey with a round, ribbed neckline, dropped shoulders and short sleeves. Gathered seams on the skirt to create soft draping.
Short, straight-cut dress in soft cotton jersey with a round, ribbed neckline, dropped shoulders and short sleeves. Gathered seams on the skirt to create soft draping.
Short, straight-cut dress in soft cotton jersey with a round, ribbed neckline, dropped shoulders and short sleeves. Gathered seams on the skirt to create soft draping.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with an opening and button at the back of the neck and a frill trim in a broderie anglaise weave around the neckline and cuffs.

Oversized jacket in washed cotton denim with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets, and a tab with adjustable buttoning at the sides of the hem. The cotton content of the jacket is partly recycled.

Oversized jacket in washed cotton denim with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets, and a tab with adjustable buttoning at the sides of the hem. The cotton content of the jacket is partly recycled.

Set with a sleeveless top and pair of shorts in soft, patterned cotton jersey. Top with frills over the shoulders and a small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Shorts with elastication, a drawstring and a small frill trim at the waist, and frill-trimmed side pockets.
Sleeveless dresses in soft cotton jersey, one with an all-over print. Gathered seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with lapped shoulders and press-studs at the crotch.
